# Overview
J.D. Dato is a Graduate Computer Science student interested in using Natural Language Processing and other Machine Learning techniques to improve mental health care. He is currently working as a research assistant at the University of South Florida's [Addiction Research and Treatment Lab](https://ARTLabUSF.github.io).


#### Research Interests
Precision Mental Health, Suicidality, Substance Use Disorders, and Psychometrics
